channel.title: Posts on Code and Electronics
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Code and Electronics

item.title: Vias and trace resistance
item.description: Does vias in a trace affect the resistance (and the current carrying capability)? If so - does it get worse or better?<!-- raw HTML omitted -->TL;DR - 5 mil traces gets a bit lower resistance with vias, thicker traces get ever so slightly worse.

item.title: Associate .dig files with Digital on macOS
item.description: Here are the steps I take to associate .dig files to autostart the Digital application on double-click. Normally a script/shell file can’t be associated to an extension in macOS. To solve this I make a small “app” using the built-in Automator application and have that run a script that runs Digital. Please note that these intructions assume that you have installed the Digital “jar” file in /Applications/Digital If you’re having it somewhere else you need to adjust the Automator code.
